Articles.Content:
A couple of days ago I found this gem released for Android. It's not classic BARIS, but the new opensource Race into Space ported to Android OS. It is really cool to see it revived. It has some bugs, but as far as I know, new releases will come.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=es.dabit.obaris2
Classic of the classics! And the animations of the original Cd-dos version still amazeme more that the Buzz Aldrin Space Program Manager.

Hi. I'm the programmer of Android-Race Into Space.

I fixed some serious bugs which affected all EVA and docking missions.

Updates are already available on Goggle Play.

I'm open to feedback, suggestions and enhancements.
